refsect1.title: Example Setup
refsect1.para: The service is prepared by loading the SQL file. This performs the following:

itemizedlist.listitem: Define a stored procedure for the SOAP service that opens a TCP session, and makes a SMTP exchange without sending a mail body to the server. Read responses from the server and makes an XML document.
The SOAP service is achieved by defining the /email_service URL to have same functionality as using soap_server() function call.
